borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The proposed double storey front extension and roof alterations, by reason of scale, siting and design would represent unsympathetic and uncharacteristic additions to the dwelling house and surrounding local character. The proposal is thereby detrimental to the character and appearance of the street scene, dwelling house and the distinctive Becontree Estate. The proposal is therefore contrary to:&nbsp;<div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>- Policies D1, D4 and D8 of the London Plan (March 2021);</div><div><br></div><div>- Policies CP2, CP3 and CR2 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>- Policies BP2, and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>- Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 f the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation version, October 2020</div>

<p>The proposed first floor rear extension, by reason of its design and siting would represent an unsympathetic and incongruous addition to the existing dwellinghouse. Furthermore, the proposed development would result in an increased sense of overbearingness, overlooking and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to neighbouring occupiers at No.96, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:</p><p>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);&nbsp;</p><p>- Policies D1, D4 and D8 of The London Plan (March 2021);</p><p>- Policies CP2 and CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);&nbsp;</p><p>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);&nbsp;</p><p>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);&nbsp;</p><p>- Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4, DMD6 and SPP6 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation version, October 2020</p>
description: Construction of two storey front extension, first floor rear extension, and loft conversion including raising of roof.
